document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Art of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Fantasy Game''''' is an artbook published by [[TSR, Inc.]] in 1989. It features full-color artworks and sketches by [[Clyde Caldwell]], [[Jeff Easley]], [[Larry Elmore]], [[Fred Fields]], [[Keith Parkinson]], and others from then-recent {{Dnd}} and other TSR publications, for ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'', ''[[Oriental Adventures]]'', and other settings.
{{quote|
Enter the realm of dragons, warriors, wizards, and other wonders in this splendid collection of fantasy art.

''The Art of the ADVANCED DUNGEONS & DRAGONS Fantasy Game'' features the art of Clyde Caldwell, Jeff Easley, Larry Elmore, Fred Fields, Keith Parkinson and many other well-known fantasy artists.|Back-cover texts}}
